test_result.test_message: Generate a professional intro pitch presentation for Acme Corp, a Technology company. Key pain points: Legacy systems causing downtime, High operational costs, Need for digital transformation. Products to highlight: CloudSync Platform, AI Analytics Suite. Tone: Professional. Number of slides: 8.
test_result.notes: Agent uses code_interpreter with python-pptx to generate PPTX files. Returns text response with module_outputs containing downloadable file URLs. UI handles both PPTX file output and structured slide data fallback.
